title: Did not have to wait for doctor
detail: The patient did not have to wait, and was seen immediately by a nurse upon presenting at the hospital
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Had to wait for doctor (less than 30 mins wait)
detail: The patient had to wait for a doctor, but was seen within 30 minutes of being triaged
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Had to wait for doctor (more than 30 mins wait)
detail: The patient had to wait for at least 30 minutes after being triaged before they were seen by a doctor
help: additional help or links related to the item

title: Outcome of treatment by doctor
detail: Please record information in relation to the doctor's treatment of the patient
